issue.title: Table is moving over time, cordless drill dancing in qualification task 2 scenario

content.raw:
Actually the table is supposed to be static .... the problem here is that there are two versions of the table, one for sdf 1.2 and one for sdf 1.3. The 1.2 one is non-static and the 1.3 one is static ... this worked out as long as Gazebo had sdf version 1.3, but now with 1.4+ it screws up its version selection process and instead of taking 1.3 it uses version 1.2 (it only checks for current version and first file it can find). So this might also be the problem for your other collision related ticket.

So there's 2 things that need to be done / can be done:

 * make qual_task_2.world include table as static
 * fix version selection process in gazebo
 * sync old 1.2 version with 1.3
